column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Hiroshi Sato says : " What do you think of my little operation here ? "
#Text=Mako says : " It 's very impressive , Mr. Sato . "
#Text=Hiroshi Sato says : " Please , call me Hiroshi .
#Text=I too came from humble beginnings .
#Text=Why , when I was your age , I was a mere shoe - shiner , and all I had to my name was an idea ; the Satomobile .
#Text=Now , I was fortunate enough to meet someone who believed in me and my work ethic .
#Text=He gave me the money I needed to get my idea off the ground and I built the entire Future Industries empire from that one selfless loan .
#Text=" Asami says : " Dad , stop bragging .
#Text=Just tell Mako the good news .
#Text=" Mako says : " What good news ?
#Text=" Hiroshi Sato says : " Well , my daughter passionately told me all about your hard earned success in the Pro-bending Arena .
#Text=And about your team 's current financial stumbling block .
#Text=Now , I 'd hate to see you lose your chance at winning the championship just because you 're short a few yuans .
#Text=That 's why I 'm going to sponsor the Fire Ferrets in the tournament .
#Text=" Mako says : " Are you serious ?
#Text=" Asami says : " He 's serious .
#Text=My dad 's going to cover your ante for the championship pot .
#Text=" Mako says : " Tha - that is good news .
#Text=" Hiroshi Sato says : " There 's just one catch .
#Text=You all have to wear the Future Industries logo on your uniforms .
#Text=" Mako says : " I 'll tattoo it on my chest if you want , sir .
#Text=Thank you both so much .
#Text=I promise the Fire Ferrets will make the most of this opportunity .
#Text=" Ikki says : " Out of the way Daddy , we 're driving here !
#Text=Beeeeeeep beebeebeeeeep !
#Text=" Meelo says : " Beep - beep .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " I see Tarrlok 's gifts are getting more and more extravagant .
#Text=" Korra says : " Yeah , that guy does n't know how to take " no " for an answer .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " Korra , are you ... doing all right ?
#Text=" Korra says : " Yeah , I 'm fine .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " Why do n't you take a break ?
#Text=I 'm glad you turned down Tarrlok , but I just want to make sure your decision was for the right reason .
#Text=" Korra says : " I 'm just really focused on my airbending right now is all .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " Right , that 's what you said .
#Text=You know , it 's okay to be scared .
#Text=The whole city is frightened by what 's been going on .
#Text=The important thing is to talk about our fears , because if we do n't , they can throw us out of balance .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " I 'm always here for you , if you want to talk .
#Text="
